definition: variant of 菸鹼|菸碱[yan1 jian3]/nicotine
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
variant of 菸鹼酸|菸碱酸[yan1 jian3 suan1]/niacin

sentences.english: Five synthesis methods of the third generation nicotinic insecticide-dinotefuran are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了第三代烟碱类杀虫剂呋虫胺的5种合成方法。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a composition of novel nicotinamide insecticide nitenpyram.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及新型烟碱类杀虫剂烯啶虫胺的组合物。

sentences.english: Imidaclotrid is a new chloro - nicotine type insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 吡虫啉为新型氯代烟碱类杀虫剂。

sentences.english: Pellagra is caused by a severe deficiency of biologically available niacin in the diet.
sentences.chinese: 饮食中严重缺乏有利人体的烟碱酸就造成糙皮病。

sentences.english: Anabolism of total alkali had closely relations with soluble sugar and metabolism of nitride.
sentences.chinese: 烟碱的合成与可溶性糖的转化和氮代谢密切相关。

sentences.english: This study lays the foundation for the application of nicotine biodegradation.
sentences.chinese: 为微生物降烟碱的研究及应用提供了理论依据。

sentences.english: In some treatments the content of nicotinamide was decreased in some degree.
sentences.chinese: 有的烟样中，烟碱含量比对照有所下降。

sentences.english: Avoid caffeine and nicotine, as they are stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 避免咖啡因及烟碱，因为它们是刺激性的。

sentences.english: However, the effects on nicotine production caused by leaf wounding were smaller than that caused by removing the shoot apex.
sentences.chinese: 但叶面损伤对烟株体内烟碱合成的影响小于打顶处理。

definition: ethanol C2H5OH/same as alcohol 酒精
